12 class iauv_motion_planner_node

31 iauv_motion_planner_node::iauv_motion_planner_node(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
32 {
33 
34  // scn = std::make_shared<iauv_motion_planner::Scene>();
35  simple = std::make_shared<iauv_motion_planner::SimplePlanner>(nh);
36  scan = std::make_shared<iauv_motion_planner::ScanPlanner>(nh);
37  circ = std::make_shared<iauv_motion_planner::CircPlanner>(nh);
38 
39  pub = nh.advertise<nav_msgs::Path>("/iauv_motion_planner/path", 2, true);
40  service_ = nh.advertiseService("getPath", &iauv_motion_planner_node::getPath, this);
41 }
42 
43 bool iauv_motion_planner_node::getPath(iauv_motion_planner::GetPath::Request &req, iauv_motion_planner::GetPath::Response &res)
44 {
45  std::cout << "service called\n";
46  std::cout << "received request" << "\n";
47  // std::cout << req << "\n";
48 
49  std::cout << "In frame: " << req.header.frame_id << "\n";
50  std::cout << " Start: "
51  << "X: " << req.start.position.x
52  << ", Y: " << req.start.position.y
53  << ", Z: " << req.start.position.z << "\n";
54  std::cout << " Goal: "
55  << "X: " << req.goal.position.x
56  << ", Y: " << req.goal.position.y
57  << ", Z: " << req.goal.position.z << "\n";
58 
59  Eigen::Quaternionf q(req.start.orientation.w, req.start.orientation.x,
60  req.start.orientation.y, req.start.orientation.z);
61 
62  std::vector<double> start = {req.start.position.x, req.start.position.y, req.start.position.z,
63  atan2(q.toRotationMatrix()(1, 0), q.toRotationMatrix()(0, 0))};
64 
65  q = Eigen::Quaternionf(req.goal.orientation.w, req.goal.orientation.x,
66  req.goal.orientation.y, req.goal.orientation.z);
67 
68  std::vector<double> goal = {req.goal.position.x, req.goal.position.y, req.goal.position.z,
69  atan2(q.toRotationMatrix()(1, 0), q.toRotationMatrix()(0, 0))};
70 
71  // no usar este angle y usar el goal[3]
72  double angle = atan2(q.toRotationMatrix()(1, 0), q.toRotationMatrix()(0, 0));
73  std::vector<double> prepath;
74 
75  // nav_msgs::PathPtr path;
76  // path->header = req.header;
77 
78  switch (req.planner)
79  {
80  case iauv_motion_planner::GetPathRequest::SIMPLE:
81  res.path = simple->doPlan(start, goal);
82  break;
83  case iauv_motion_planner::GetPathRequest::SCANNER:
84  if (!scan->checkParams(req.params))
85  {
86  break;
87  }
88  prepath = {req.goal.position.x - (scan->params_["length"] / 2),
89  req.goal.position.y - (scan->params_["width"] / 2),
90  req.goal.position.z,
91  angle + 3.1415};
92 
93  // simple->path_ = simple->doPlan(start, prepath);
94  scan->path_ = simple->doPlan(start, prepath);
95  scan->path_.header = req.header;
96  res.path = scan->doPlan(goal);
97  break;
98  case iauv_motion_planner::GetPathRequest::CIRCULAR:
99  if (!circ->checkParams(req.params))
100  {
101  break;
102  }
103  prepath = {req.goal.position.x + ((circ->params_["radius"]) * cos(angle)),
104  req.goal.position.y + ((circ->params_["radius"]) * sin(angle)),
105  req.goal.position.z,
106  angle + 3.1415};
107  std::cout << "\n";
108 
109  circ->path_ = simple->doPlan(start, prepath);
110  circ->path_.header = req.header;
111  res.path = circ->doPlan(goal, goal);
112  break;
113  default:
114  std::cout << "planner switch defaulted\n";
115  break;
116  }
117 
118  pub.publish(res.path);
119  // scn->drawPath(res.path);
120 
121  return true;
122 }
123 
124 int main(int argc, char **argv)
125 {
126  std::cout << "yeah planning\n";
127  ros::init(argc, argv, "planner_node");
128  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
129 
130  iauv_motion_planner_node node(nh);
131 
132  while (ros::ok())
133  {
134  // ros::spinOnce();
135  // ros::Duration(1).sleep();
136  ros::spin();
137  }
138 
139  return 0;
140 }
